text: Hearthstone is an online free-to-play collectible card game by Blizzard Entertainment. Hearthstone may also refer to: * A stone that makes up part of a hearth, or fireplace * Hearthstone Castle, in Connecticut, U.S. * Hearthstone Historic House Museum, in Appleton, Wisconsin, U.S. * Hicklin Hearthstone, a historical building in Lexington, Missouri, U.S. == See also == * Heartstone (disambiguation) * Stonehearth
title: Hearthstone (disambiguation)
